= Introduction =

This page explains how you can build your own copy of the Notepas binary from the svn sources.

The instructions below show how to build NotePas on a Windows machine but you can also build it on a Linux or Mac OS X machine.


You need the 2.7.1 version of the FPC compiler which can be found here:

[ftp://ftp.stack.nl/mirrors/fpc/snapshot/v27/i386-win32/fpc-2.7.1.i386-win32.zip]
